data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: The snow is making a big hill in front of the back door. We ____ to ____ it ____ the ____ so ____ we ____ open ____ door ____ enter ____ house. Go ____ on ____ coat. We will need to do some work to get this path clear.
data.partBlankContent: The snow is making a big hill in front of the back door. We ne__ to pu__ it t_ the si__ so th__ we c__ open t__ door a__ enter t__ house. Go p__ on yo__ coat. We will need to do some work to get this path clear.
data.fullContent: The snow is making a big hill in front of the back door. We need to push it to the side so that we can open the door and enter the house. Go put on your coat. We will need to do some work to get this path clear.
data.answer: 雪在后门前面堆成一座小山。我们需要把它推到一边，这样我们才能打开门，进入房子。去穿上你的外套。我们需要做一些工作来清理这条道路。
